scripts.postbuild: move-file dist/standalone-macos-x64 dist/tailwindcss-macos-x64 && move-file dist/standalone-macos-arm64 dist/tailwindcss-macos-arm64 && move-file dist/standalone-win-x64.exe dist/tailwindcss-windows-x64.exe && move-file dist/standalone-linuxstatic-x64 dist/tailwindcss-linux-x64 && move-file dist/standalone-linuxstatic-arm64 dist/tailwindcss-linux-arm64
